body: I just bought a badge with an orange color, and after I bought it, my text looked normal. Can a staff member please help me get it back?
body_tagged: I just bought a badge with an orange color, and after I bought it, my text looked normal. Can a staff member please help me get it back?
title: Cosmetic shop GLITCH

replies.body: When you purchase a badge color you have to have a badge to begin with. It's a symbol that appears next to your name, not full colored text you get to write in all the time.

replies.body: Did you enable it? I don't really get you.

replies.body:
He said he brought a badge with an orange colour.

I suggest you go into your ender chest to see if it's all there. If it is, just equip it.
